Text: Good episode, but the thing is that the top and bottom are cut off.

I'm assuming that C_P records this full frame, which means there would be black bars at the top and bottom. When he reframes it, it removes the black bars along with anything else in that area.
Just a guess, though.

i hope the 720p versions get uploaded soon
